name: Wheelchair of Death (VR)
description:
The old almighty reaper is following granny down the street to take her life but she is not one of those to easily give up and she takes whatever she can to run away.

✪✪✪✪✪✪✪✪✪✪

Key Features :

- Cute & Funky Art Styles

- Super Immersive Wheelchair Experience

- Specially Designed Procedurally Generated Level

✪✪✪✪✪✪✪✪✪✪

This project is meant to be played on VR Ready Windows Device with HTC VIVE VR Device. This project was created for game jam purpose. The assets in this game are built with zero funding and captured from unity default sprites, self-drawn, free art assets and royalty free sounds websites .

♯♯♯♯♯♯♯♯♯♯♯♯♯♯♯♯♯♯♯♯♯♯♯♯♯♯♯♯♯♯♯♯♯♯♯♯♯♯♯♯
